description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员和中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国家级副职领导人、中华人民共和国最高人民检察院检察长。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China and a politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as a deputy state leader and Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 杨易辰的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Yang Yichen.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院
en: Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高检察机关。
description.en: The highest procuratorial organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在黑龙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间黑龙江省的权力机构，于1979年12月撤销。
description.en: The governing body of Heilongjiang Province during the Cultural Revolution, abolished in December 1979.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议黑龙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议黑龙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在黑龙江省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期至文化大革命前黑龙江省的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Heilongjiang Province from the early days of the People's Republic of China until the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间设立的中华人民共和国政治咨询机构。
description.en: A political advisory body in the People's Republic of China that existed from 1982 to 1992.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国领导人职务级别之一。
description.en: One of the position levels for leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 对在中国共产党和中华人民共和国担任主要领导职务的中华人民共和国高级领导人的统称。
description.en: A collective term for high-level leaders of the People's Republic of China who hold major leadership positions in the Communist Party of China and the state.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1966年至1976年发生的全国性政治运动。
description.en: A nationwide political movement in the People's Republic of China that took place from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任最高人民检察院检察长，是杨易辰的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, predecessor to Yang Yichen.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任最高人民检察院检察长，是杨易辰的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, successor to Yang Yichen.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杨易辰在中共黑龙江省委书记和黑龙江省革命委员会主任职位上的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor to Yang Yichen as Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee and Director of the Heilongjiang Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杨易辰在中共黑龙江省委书记职位上的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Yang Yichen as Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在黑龙江省革命委员会改制为黑龙江省人民政府后担任省长，可视作杨易辰在黑龙江最高行政长官职位上的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician who became Governor of Heilongjiang Province after the Provincial Revolutionary Committee was restructured into the Provincial People's Government, can be regarded as the successor to Yang Yichen as the top administrative official of Heilongjiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任黑龙江省省长及省政协主席。杨易辰曾是其下属，并在省政协主席职位上接替了他。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Governor and Chairman of the CPPCC of Heilongjiang Province. Yang Yichen was his subordinate and succeeded him as Chairman of the Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，杨易辰在黑龙江省政协主席职位上的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Yang Yichen as Chairman of the CPPCC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任黑龙江省省长。杨易辰担任副省长时，曾是其下属。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Governor of Heilongjiang Province. Yang Yichen served as his subordinate when he was Vice Governor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任黑龙江省省长。杨易辰担任副省长时，曾是其下属。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Governor of Heilongjiang Province. Yang Yichen served as his subordinate when he was Vice Governor.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省的县，是杨易辰的出生地。
description.en: A county in Liaoning Province, China, and the birthplace of Yang Yichen.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 黑龙江省的省级人民政府，于1979年12月由黑龙江省革命委员会改制而成。
description.en: The provincial people's government of Heilongjiang Province, transformed from the Heilongjiang Provincial Revolutionary Committee in December 1979.

description.zh-cn: 肖塞是杨易辰的夫人。
description.en: Xiao Sai was the wife of Yang Yichen.

description.zh-cn: 杨易辰在担任黑龙江省人民委员会副省长期间，韩光曾任省长，是其直接上级。
description.en: While Yang Yichen was Vice Governor of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Committee, Han Guang served as Governor, his direct superior.

description.zh-cn: 杨易辰在担任黑龙江省人民委员会副省长期间，欧阳钦曾任省长，是其直接上级。
description.en: While Yang Yichen was Vice Governor of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Committee, Ouyang Qin served as Governor, his direct superior.

description.zh-cn: 杨易辰在担任黑龙江省人民委员会副省长期间，李范五曾任省长，是其直接上级。
description.en: While Yang Yichen was Vice Governor of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Committee, Li Fanwu served as Governor, his direct superior.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，杨易辰于1967年被中止黑龙江省人民委员会副省长职务。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Yang Yichen's tenure as Vice Governor of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Committee was terminated in 1967.

relationships.target: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会
中国人民政治协商会议黑龙江省委员会
中国共产党中央委员会
中华人民共和国最高人民检察院

description.zh-cn: 杨易辰于1983年3月接替黄火青担任最高人民检察院检察长。
description.en: In March 1983, Yang Yichen succeeded Huang Huoqing as the Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate.

description.zh-cn: 刘复之于1988年4月接替杨易辰担任最高人民检察院检察长。
description.en: In April 1988, Liu Fuzhi succeeded Yang Yichen as the Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate.

description.zh-cn: 杨易辰于1977年12月接替刘光涛担任中国共产党黑龙江省委员会书记和黑龙江省革命委员会主任。
description.en: In December 1977, Yang Yichen succeeded Liu Guangtao as Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee and Director of the Heilongjiang Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李力安于1983年2月接替杨易辰担任中国共产党黑龙江省委员会书记。
description.en: In February 1983, Li Li'an succeeded Yang Yichen as Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 杨易辰于1979年12月卸任黑龙江省革命委员会主任，该机构后改制为黑龙江省人民政府，由陈雷担任省长，可视作职务接替。
description.en: Yang Yichen stepped down as Director of the Heilongjiang Provincial Revolutionary Committee in December 1979; the committee was then restructured into the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Government, with Chen Lei serving as governor, marking a succession of office.

description.zh-cn: 杨易辰于1977年12月接替欧阳钦担任中国人民政治协商会议黑龙江省委员会主席。
description.en: In December 1977, Yang Yichen succeeded Ouyang Qin as Chairman of the CPPCC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 王一伦于1979年12月接替杨易辰担任中国人民政治协商会议黑龙江省委员会主席。
description.en: In December 1979, Wang Yilun succeeded Yang Yichen as Chairman of the CPPCC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1979年12月，黑龙江省革命委员会被撤销，由新成立的黑龙江省人民政府取代。
description.en: In December 1979, the Heilongjiang Provincial Revolutionary Committee was abolished and replaced by the newly established Heilongjiang Provincial People's Government.
